item.title: RSS feed available
item.description: We are happy to provide an RSS feed for announcements related to Castor at http://castor.codehaus.org/rss/castor-announcement.xml. This service basically mirrors the information provided at our news page at http://castor.codehaus.org/news.html.
item.author: Werner Guttmann

item.title: A new home
item.author: Werner Guttmann
item.description:
After over five years of Exolab (http://www.exolab.org)sponsoring Castor, the Castor team recently decided to move the entire project to a new home over at the Codehaus (http://www.codehaus.org). The team would like to thank Exolab and it's parent company Intalio, Inc. for it's long-standing support of the project.
Please use the below links for access to ...
- Main documentation (http://castor.codehaus.org) - CVS repository (http://cvs.castor.codehaus.org) - Download (http://dist.codehaus.org/castor)

item.title: Castor JDO - new committers
item.author: Werner Guttmann
item.description: Please join me to welcome Gregory, Martin, Ralf and Stein as new committers for Castor JDO. I am more than happy to have them on board, as all of them have shown their dedication to the project through numerous occasions (incl. patches and willingness to spend time with me and Bruce ...).

item.title: Final 0.9.6 release available
item.author: Werner Guttmann
item.description: The final release of Castor 0.9.6 has been made available at http://dist.codehaus.org/castor/0.9.6.

item.title: 0.9.6 release candidate 3 available
item.author: Werner Guttmann
item.description: The third release candidate of Castor 0.9.6 has been made available at http://dist.codehaus.org/castor/0.9.6/

item.title: 0.9.6 release candidate 2 available
item.author: Werner Guttmann
item.description: The second release candidate of Castor 0.9.6 has been made available at http://dist.codehaus.org/castor/0.9.6/

item.title: 0.9.6 release candidate 1 available
item.author: Werner Guttmann
item.description: The first release candidate of Castor 0.9.6 has been made available at http://dist.codehaus.org/castor/0.9.6/
